alternativeHeadline: Succotash of Fresh Corn, Lima Beans, Tomatoes, and Onion Recipe
description: Succotash of Fresh Corn, Lima Beans, Tomatoes, and Onion Recipe
headline: Succotash of Fresh Corn, Lima Beans, Tomatoes, and Onion
name: Succotash of Fresh Corn, Lima Beans, Tomatoes, and Onion
recipeIngredient: 2 1/4 cups corn kernels cut from 4 ears of corn (preferably 2 ears of white corn and 2 ears of yellow corn)
2 cups fresh lima beans (from about 2 pounds pods) or 10 to 11 ounces frozen lima beans or baby butter beans, thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and sprinkle with coarse salt. Sauté until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic; stir until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add tomatoes, corn, and lima beans. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until corn and lima beans are tender and tomatoes are soft, about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season to taste with salt and pepper. DO AHEAD Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill. Rewarm before continuing.
